body_html:
Sorry you ran into this. There was a bug with when restore ops got run when graph building; the correct behavior was to mimic eager execution (run restore ops in the Session as they came in), but they were getting run just once instead (which probably interacts with Sequential building immediately here).

Your snippet works for me in the 2018-06-28 nightly. The fix was 21d94be#diff-7b3f8757e2c5c405c3d056aa0a301c8f

Could you give a nightly a try?

Your snippet works for me in the 2018-06-28 nightly. The fix was 21d94be#diff-7b3f8757e2c5c405c3d056aa0a301c8f
Could you give a nightly a try?
body:
Sorry you ran into this. There was a bug with when restore ops got run when graph building; the correct behavior was to mimic eager execution (run restore ops in the Session as they came in), but they were getting run just once instead (which probably interacts with Sequential building immediately here).

Your snippet works for me in the 2018-06-28 nightly. The fix was https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/21d94be838f7a7917f072e5ec0bbe6e3593177b9#diff-7b3f8757e2c5c405c3d056aa0a301c8f

Could you give a nightly a try?
